attributes.action: Stop The Closure Of Afflecks Palace, Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop The Closure Of Afflecks Palace, Manchester."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15222.asp

Prime Minister's Office
